ygData.subject: Thinking of Buying, Need info
ygData.msgSnippet: Ive looked at buying EQ since it came out but no one i know plays it so i dont know what its like. I like rpgs, thats not the problem. I just dont want to buy
ygData.messageBody:
Ive looked at buying EQ since it came out but no
one i know plays it so i dont know what its like. I
like rpgs, thats not the problem. I just dont want to
buy a game and be stuck w/ it so im looking into it.
Is it only an internet game or can you play by
yourself on your pc. How much is it a month for the
internet, is it a flat rate or by the hour. Look forward to
hearing and playing if its all everyone is saying it is.
